subject: Pro x pedals
description_text: Hello I had these pedals in late February-early March and I've recently had an issue with the brake pedal I'm not sure what the issue is but specifically in iRacing when I'm running a road course and get into a heavy braking zone after I slow down to make the turn I'm noticing on the gas brake and clutch levels obviously I'm fully back on the gas but the brake is showing up and I've had to pump the brake really quick to get the red to go away because it's obviously slowing down my times and speed I've been working on calibrating the pedal and adjusting the dead zone but idk if it's a sensor issue and if so I'm not sure how to fix it this is my first set of load cell pedals

conversations.body_text: Hi metallicafan2488, Do you have a photo showing the side view of the pedal installation? I can help check if there’s any mechanical interference. Also, could you let me know the brand of your wheel base?
